about_the_game:
What is the good life of an adventurer?
You don't have to work hard for a long time at a regular job, you can always go to the nearest dungeon and kill monsters there.
And the money will fall right out of them right into your pocket. And most importantly, you can always spend them in a tavern on gentle beauties who will be happy to brighten up your leisure time.
All of them are waiting for you and monsters and beauties!


Fight with the dungeon dwellers and enjoy sex scenes with lovely girls!
You have to consistently conquer 5 dungeons of varying difficulty.
Defeat opponents, fight terrible bosses, get more and more sophisticated weapons.
The gold earned from the campaigns can be exchanged for revealing outfits of the heroines.
Enjoy the fruits of your victories!


What could be better than finding a whole chest of gold? Just find two chests of gold!
The main thing is not to think about where they even came from in a dungeon full of disgusting monsters…

The game contains:
- 23 unique enemies
- 5 unique weapons
- Relaxing music
- Randomly generated dungeons

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or sexual scenes, Adult Content.
In the game, fully nude characters pose for the player.

All characters are over 21 years old.

name: Your Waifu JUICE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 SP1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fight with the dungeon dwellers and enjoy sex scenes with lovely girls! You have to consistently conquer 5 dungeons of varying difficulty. Defeat opponents, fight terrible bosses, get more and more sophisticated weapons.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
